li.a: Arthur Lovington Atwood Hammond High School

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: We want to thank you for your flexibility and patience as the situation related to the COVID-19 outbreak continues to evolve. The safety of our students and staff is our top priority.

Illinois Governor Pritzker has extended school closures in Illinois through the rest of the current school year, in which schools will continue with remote learning. We will update this page as new information is released. We ask that parents, guardians, staff, and students to please watch for emails, social media, and website postings on updates.
Arthur CUSD #305 will use this page as a reference for any updates regarding COVID-19.

hr.h4: ARTHUR LOVINGTON ATWOOD HAMMOND HIGH SCHOOL
hr.p: High school teachers will be posting student learning opportunities using Google Classroom. Please make sure your high school students are checking their Google Classroom.
